channel.title: Skill Cape Emote
channel.description:
can u do me a favor , i have another Skill Cape tut in my client and tried to translate this guide's emotes (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,136090.0.html) to this guides skill capes (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,131557.0.html_
can anyone help me make emotes for that tut, thank you
~~Heaven
attack = 3789 defence = 3785 strength = 3777 hitpoints = 3787 slayer = 3769 prayer = 3779 magic = 3781 ranged = 3765 cooking = 3759 thieving = 3763 fishing = 3783
and i want to make emotes like the 1st tut i mentioned from those ID's which are found in the 2nd tut i mentioned.
